member.name: T:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas
member.summary: Draws objects on an area in itself.

member.name: P:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.IsDragging
member.summary: Returns true if something is currently dragged in this control. For example, moving or rotating an object.

member.name: P:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.MultiSelect
member.summary: Gets or sets whether multiple objects can be selected at the same time.

member.name: P:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.BackColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the controls background color.

member.name: P:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.CanvasBackColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the actual draw area inside the control.

member.name: P:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.ScaleMin
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum scale value, specifying how far you can "zoom in".

member.name: P:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.ScaleMax
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum scale value, specifying how far you can "zoom out".

member.name: P:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.ScaleCurrent
member.summary: Gets or sets the current scale.

member.name: P:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.ScaleStep
member.summary: Gets or sets by how much the scale changes when the mouse wheel is used.

member.name: P:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.ScaleType
member.summary: Gets or sets how the canvas is scaled.
member.remarks: If the Static type is used the canvas scales by exactly the number in ScaleStep every time. The dynamic type uses ScaleStep as a percentage of the current scale, to scale faster when scaled out far and slower when scaled in close.

member.name: P:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.InvertY
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the canvas is inverted and 0,0 is found at the bottom left instead of the top right.

member.name: P:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.SelectedObjectsCount
member.summary: Returns the number of objects currently selected.

member.name: P:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.DrawOutsideCanvasArea
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to draw outside of the canvas' drawing area or to clip it.

member.name: P:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.SelectedTool
member.summary: Gets or sets the selected interaction tool.

member.name: P:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.CanvasAreaSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the canvas' drawing area size.

member.name: E:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.ObjectMoved
member.summary: Raised when an object was moved.

member.name: E:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.ObjectRotated
member.summary: Raised when an object was rotated.

member.name: E:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.ObjectSelected
member.summary: Raised when an object was selected.

member.name: E:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.ScaleChanged
member.summary: Raised when the canvas' scale changed.

member.name: M:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.#ctor
member.summary: Creates new instance.

member.name: M:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.BeginUpdate
member.summary: Stops redraws of the control until EndUpdate is called.

member.name: M:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.EndUpdate
member.summary: Reactivates redraws and invalidates control.

member.name: M:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.OnCreateControl
member.summary: Initializes canvas area after the control was created.

member.name: M:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.SetCanvasArea(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Sets the canvas drawing area's size.

member.name: M:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.ScaleToFitCenter
member.summary: Scales canvas area to fit into the control's area and centers it.

member.name: M:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.ScaleToFit
member.summary: Scales canvas area to fit into the control's area.

member.name: M:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.CenterCanvas
member.summary: Centers canvas area on control's area.

member.name: M:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.Add(PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.CanvasObject)
member.summary: Adds object to the canvas for it to be drawn.

member.name: M:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.SortObjects
member.summary: Sorts objects by draw order.

member.name: M:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.GetFirstObjectAt(System.Drawing.PointF)
member.summary: Returns the first object at the given world position.

member.name: M:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.GetObject(System.Func{PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.CanvasObject,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Returns first object that matches the given predicate, or null no object was found.

member.name: M:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.Remove(PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.CanvasObject)
member.summary: Removes the given object from this canvas.

member.name: M:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.GetObjectsAt(System.Drawing.PointF,System.Func{PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.CanvasObject,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Returns the first object at the given world position.

member.name: M:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.ClearObjects
member.summary: Removes all canvas objects.

member.name: M:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.OnPaint(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)
member.summary: Paints control, incl canvas area and all objects.

member.name: M:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.OnPaintBackground(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)
member.summary: Paints control's background.

member.name: M:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.GetWorldPosition(System.Drawing.PointF)
member.summary: Returns the position in 1:1 scale, relative to the canvas area and its scale.

member.name: M:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.GetCanvasPosition(System.Drawing.PointF)
member.summary: Inverse of GetWorldPosition, returns position on the canvas relative to a scaled point on it.

member.name: M:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.TransformCanvasPosition(System.Drawing.PointF)
member.summary: Returns position in canvas area, based on a point on the control.

member.name: M:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.SelectObject(PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.CanvasObject,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Marks the given object as selected.
member.param: Set to true if object should be added to the currently selected objects.

member.name: M:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.ClearSelectionInternal
member.summary: Unselects all selected objects without invalidating.

member.name: M:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.ClearSelection
member.summary: Unselects all selected objects.

member.name: M:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.UnselectObject(PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.CanvasObject)
member.summary: Unselected the given object.

member.name: M:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.HandleSelection(System.Collections.Generic.List{PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.CanvasObject})
member.summary: Updates selected objects with the given ones.

member.name: M:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.GetSelectedObjects
member.summary: Returns list of all selected objects.

member.name: M:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.OnMouseDown(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)
member.summary: Initializes drag process when the mouse is pressed down.

member.name: M:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.OnMouseUp(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)
member.summary: Ends drag process when mouse is let go off.

member.name: M:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.OnMouseMove(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles dragging process while the mouse moves over the control.

member.name: M:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.OnMouseWheel(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)
member.summary: Modifies scale, zooming in and out when the mouse wheel is used.

member.name: M:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.OnMouseDoubleClick(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)
member.summary: Resets scale area on double middle click.

member.name: M:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.OnObjectMoved(PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.ObjectMovedEventArgs)
member.summary: Called when an object was moved.

member.name: M:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.OnObjectRotated(PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.ObjectRotatedEventArgs)
member.summary: Called when an object was rotated.

member.name: M:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.OnObjectSelected(PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.ObjectSelectedEventArgs)
member.summary: Called when an object was selected.

member.name: M:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.OnScaleChanged(PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.ScaleChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: Called when the canvas' scale changed..

member.name: M:PrimitiveCanvas.Canvas.ScrollToWorldPosition(System.Drawing.PointF)
member.summary: Scrolls the given position to the center of the canvas.

member.name: T:PrimitiveCanvas.Interactions.InteractionMode
member.summary: Specifies how objects can be interacted with.

member.name: F:PrimitiveCanvas.Interactions.InteractionMode.Direct
member.summary: Objects can be directly moved, rotated, etc.

member.name: F:PrimitiveCanvas.Interactions.InteractionMode.Tools
member.summary: The respective tool must be active to interact with an object.

member.name: T:PrimitiveCanvas.Interactions.ScaleType
member.summary: Defines how a canvas is scaled/zoomed.

member.name: F:PrimitiveCanvas.Interactions.ScaleType.Static
member.summary: Every scale action modifies the scale by a specific amount.

member.name: F:PrimitiveCanvas.Interactions.ScaleType.Dynamic
member.summary: The scale amount is dynamically chosen based on the current scale. The farther out the scale is, the faster the scaling is.

member.name: T:PrimitiveCanvas.Interactions.Tool
member.summary: Specifies which tool is currently selected.

member.name: F:PrimitiveCanvas.Interactions.Tool.Free
member.summary: Direct control over everything.

member.name: F:PrimitiveCanvas.Interactions.Tool.Scroll
member.summary: Scroll over map by using the mouse.

member.name: F:PrimitiveCanvas.Interactions.Tool.Move
member.summary: Move an object with the mouse.

member.name: F:PrimitiveCanvas.Interactions.Tool.Rotate
member.summary: Rotate an object with the mouse.

member.name: T:PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.CanvasObject
member.summary: An object on the canvas that can consist of multiple primitives.

member.name: F:PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.CanvasObject.DefaultPriority
member.summary: Default priority assigned to new objects.

member.name: P:PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.CanvasObject.Canvas
member.summary: Gets or sets the canvas this object is part of.

member.name: P:PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.CanvasObject.Position
member.summary: Gets or sets the object's position. Its primitives are moved relative to it.

member.name: P:PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.CanvasObject.Primitives
member.summary: Returns a list of the object's primitives.

member.name: P:PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.CanvasObject.Tag
member.summary: Gets or sets a tag that associates other data with this object.

member.name: P:PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.CanvasObject.Interactions
member.summary: Gets or sets what interactions this object accepts.

member.name: P:PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.CanvasObject.Priority
member.summary: Gets or sets the interaction priority for this object.
member.remarks: On selection the canvas prioritizes objects with a low priority property, cycling through the ones at the given position.

member.name: P:PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.CanvasObject.DrawOrder
member.summary: Gets or sets the object's draw order.
member.remarks:
The higher the property's value, the later the object is drawn, layering on top of objects with lower draw orders.
Property currently doesn't affect draw order if it's set after the object was added to a canvas.

member.name: P:PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.CanvasObject.Selected
member.summary: Returns true if this object is currently selected.

member.name: P:PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.CanvasObject.Visible
member.summary: Gets or sets whether this object is visible.
member.remarks: Objects that aren't visible can't be interacted with.

member.name: P:PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.CanvasObject.Style
member.summary: Gets or sets the object's style, specifying how its primitives are drawn.

member.name: M:PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.CanvasObject.#ctor(System.Single,System.Single,PrimitiveCanvas.Primitives.Primitive[])
member.summary: Creates new instance.

member.name: M:PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.CanvasObject.#ctor(System.Drawing.PointF,PrimitiveCanvas.Primitives.Primitive[])
member.summary: Creates new instance.

member.name: M:PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.CanvasObject.Add(PrimitiveCanvas.Primitives.Primitive)
member.summary: Adds primitive to object.

member.name: M:PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.CanvasObject.Is(PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.ObjectInteractions)
member.summary: Returns true if the given interaction is enabled by the object.

member.name: M:PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.CanvasObject.MoveBy(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Moves object and its primitives by the given amount.

member.name: M:PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.CanvasObject.MoveTo(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Moves object to given position and updates its primitive's position's relative to it.

member.name: M:PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.CanvasObject.Rotate(System.Double)
member.summary: Rotates the object's primitives by the given amount of radians around the object's position as the pivot point.

member.name: M:PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.CanvasObject.Resize(System.Double)
member.summary: Resizes object's primitives by multiplying their sizes with the given value.

member.name: M:PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.CanvasObject.IsInside(System.Drawing.PointF)
member.summary: Returns true if the given position is inside one of the object's primitives.

member.name: M:PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.CanvasObject.GetOutlinePen
member.summary: Returns a pen to draw the object primitive's outlines.

member.name: M:PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.CanvasObject.GetForegroundBrush
member.summary: Returns a brush to draw the object primitive's outlines.

member.name: M:PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.CanvasObject.Draw(System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Single,System.Int32)
member.summary: Draws object's primitives to graphics.

member.name: M:PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.CanvasObject.op_Implicit(PrimitiveCanvas.Primitives.Primitive)~PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.CanvasObject
member.summary: Implicitly converts primitive to a canvas object.

member.summary: Specifies what kind of drag process is in progress.

member.name: F:PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.DragMode.None
member.summary: No dragging here.

member.name: F:PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.DragMode.Move
member.summary: Moving an object.

member.name: F:PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.DragMode.Rotate
member.summary: Rotate an object.

member.name: F:PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.DragMode.Scroll
member.summary: Moving the canvas area.

member.name: T:PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.DrawStyle
member.summary: Specifies how primitives are drawn.

member.name: P:PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.DrawStyle.ForeColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color used for foreground colors, such as text.

member.name: P:PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.DrawStyle.SelectedForeColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color used for foreground colors, such as text, if the object is selected.

member.name: P:PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.DrawStyle.OutlineColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the outline.

member.name: P:PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.DrawStyle.SelectedOutlineColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the outline if the object is selected.

member.name: P:PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.DrawStyle.OutlineWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the width of the outline.

member.name: P:PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.DrawStyle.SelectedOutlineWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the width of the outline if the object is selected.

member.name: T:PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.ObjectInteractions
member.summary: Specifies which interaction's an object accepts.

member.name: F:PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.ObjectInteractions.None
member.summary: No interactions.

member.name: F:PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.ObjectInteractions.Selectable
member.summary: Object can be selected.

member.name: F:PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.ObjectInteractions.Movable
member.summary: Object can be moved around.

member.name: F:PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.ObjectInteractions.Rotatable
member.summary: Object can be rotated.

member.name: F:PrimitiveCanvas.Objects.ObjectInteractions.All
member.summary: Object accepts all interactions.

member.summary: Event argument for when an object was selected.

member.summary: Returns the selected object.
